Ancestry-Orc -- Male Winter Orc Fighter

Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Pet: Has a Tiny animal minion with the same level, modifiers, and AC as self, 5 Hit Points, low-light vision, 25' Speed, and creature-specific abilities

Winter Orc: Skill Trained (Survival)
Athletic Might: Successes on Athletics to Climb or Swim are critical successes
Combat Climber: Can Climb with a hand occupied, can fight while Climbing, and Climbing does not inflict off-guard
Rainfall Orc: +2 Athletics to Climb or Swim
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Terrain Expertise (Underground): +1 Survival in Underground
Combat
Hit Points: 23 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Longspear (+7 1d8+2 P; strength; expert); Orc Necksplitter (+7 1d8+2 S; strength; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+6 1d6+2 S; dexterity; trained); Shield Boss (+7 1d6+2 B; strength; expert); Tusks (+8 1d6+2 P; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Hold-Scarred Orc: +2 Hit Points
Incredible Ferocity: Has increased Orc Ferocity effects
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Orc Weapons; Falchion; Greataxe)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Tusks: Tusks inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Bloody Blows: Lethal unarmed attacks inflict 1d4 HP persistent bleed
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Ferocious Beasts: Partnered animals have the Orc Ferocity and Undying Ferocity features
Intimidating Glare: Can use a glare to Demoralize
Iron Fists: Fist attacks lose the nonlethal trait and gain the shove trait
Orc Ferocity: (R) Retains 1 Hit Point and increases the wounded condition by 1 when brought to 0 Hit Points once per hr
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon orc weapons
Rampaging Ferocity: (F) Using Orc Ferocity gives a Strike against the attacking foe that allows another use of Orc Ferocity if it reduces the foe to 0 HP
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Undying Ferocity: Using Orc Ferocity gives 1 temporary Hit Point
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Badlands Orc: Treats environmental heat as 1 step less extreme
Defy Death: -1 DC on dying recovery checks, and suffers no debilitation after being returned to life
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Grave Orc: Has resistance 1 to void damage/+1 vs. death and void effects
Hold Mark (Burning Sun): +1 vs. arcane spells
Hold Mark (Death's Head): +1 vs. primal spells
Hold Mark (Defiled Corpse): +1 vs. divine spells
Hold Mark (Empty Hand): +1 vs. occult spells
Orc Superstition: (R) +1 vs. the triggering magic effect
Pervasive Superstition: +1 vs. magic
Rainfall Orc: +1 vs. disease
Scar-Thick Skin: Ends persistent bleed damage with success on a DC 10 flat check, or on a DC 5 flat check with help
Spell Devourer: Successful saves vs. magic give temporary Hit Points equal to the effect level or double the spell rank until the end of the next turn
Winter Orc: Treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 1 available vs. 21 allocated

Incredible Ferocity Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and orc ferocity feature (currently 1)

Scar-Thick Skin Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Spell Devourer Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and orc superstition feature (currently 1)
Undying Ferocity Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and orc ferocity feature (currently 1)
